channel.title: Protests on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race
channel.description: Recent content in Protests on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race

item.title: Watch: BBC at protests near scene where Alex Pretti was shot dead
item.description: Protesters chanted Alex Pretti’s name after he became the second person this month to be shot dead by federal agents in Minneapolis.

item.title: Emory fires Iranian official's daughter after campus protests over controversial hiring decision
item.description: Fatemeh Ardeshir-Larijani, daughter of sanctioned Iranian official Ali Larijani, lost her position at Emory University as activists called for review of her immigration status.
